Properties.Name: autocli
Properties.Title: AUTOCLI : Automated CLI creation tool
Properties.Description:
AutoCLI aims to automate .NET CLI applications development based on an input architecture stored in a .json file.
The configuration file stores the architecture for the project's commands, subcommands, options, arguments and properties.

Commands.Description: Creates a template of a new .json configuration file with specified name.
Generate the CLI project based on the input .json configuration file.

Options.Name: python-interfacing
Options.Description: Specify whether or not to generate additionnal source code to link the CLI with a backend python application.
